alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 05 at 8:38PM PST until January 07 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THURSDAY TO 7 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Shasta Valley from Weed to Montague including portions of I-5. * WHEN...From 10 PM Thursday to 7 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County
